questions.quote: Giddy-up! Alright! So now, how does that work? Now, what, I get a percentage of every pledge I bring in, right?
Uhh, so you want to join me and Susan for lunch at the coffee shop?
Sand, I can get rid of the sand.  Look there's still some in here, it won't go away! Look I even got sand in the pockets!
Absolutely. But I feel I must inform you that what happened last night was more than a simple bet.
Well, I had to. I had to apologize. I mean, I punched Mickey Mantle, my idol. It was eating me up inside!
Hmm-hm. Your home, Mister Costanza. Just make sure he gets his medicine six times a day and keep his tail elevated.
Can you hear yourself? Can, can, do you know what you're saying?!
Uh, you know, why don't you go first, you just had a long trip.
